div.p: my likes

span.span: See titles to watch instantly, titles you haven't rated, etc

div.div:
Sort by:
List Order Popularity Alphabetical IMDb Rating Your Rating Number of Votes Release Date Runtime Date Added

img.alt: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice

h3.a: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice

div.title: Users rated this 6.6/10 (520,524 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
Director: Zack Snyder | Stars: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Jesse Eisenberg

img.alt: Batman: Gotham by Gaslight

div.title: Users rated this 6.9/10 (3,029 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: In an alternative Victorian Age Gotham City, Batman begins his war on crime while he investigates a new series of murders by Jack the Ripper.
Director: Sam Liu | Stars: Bruce Greenwood, Jennifer Carpenter, Chris Cox, John DiMaggio

img.alt: Batman Begins

div.title: Users rated this 8.3/10 (1,101,583 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.
Director: Christopher Nolan | Stars: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe, Liam Neeson

img.alt: Justice League

div.title: Users rated this 8.6/10 (32,497 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.
Stars: Carl Lumbly, Phil LaMarr, Michael Rosenbaum, George Newbern

img.alt: Justice League Part Two

div.p: The plot is unknown.
Director: Zack Snyder | Stars: Gal Gadot, Henry Cavill, Ben Affleck

img.alt: Justice League Dark

div.title: Users rated this 7.1/10 (12,065 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: Beings with supernatural powers join together to fight against supernatural villains. This team of supernatural beings include John Constantine, Zatanna and Jason Blood also known as the demon Etrigan.
Director: Jay Oliva | Stars: Rosario Dawson, Camilla Luddington, Jeremy Davies, Jerry O'Connell

img.alt: Justice League

div.title: Users rated this 8.6/10 (32,497 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: Seven of the most formidable heroes form arguably the most powerful team ever.
Stars: Carl Lumbly, Phil LaMarr, Michael Rosenbaum, George Newbern

img.alt: Justice League Unlimited

div.title: Users rated this 8.9/10 (2,714 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: A continuation of the Justice League animated series finds the original members of the team joined in their battle against crime and evil by dozens of other heroes from the DC comics universe.
Stars: George Newbern, Kevin Conroy, Phil LaMarr, Carl Lumbly

img.alt: Justice League: The Flashpoint Paradox

div.title: Users rated this 8.2/10 (32,635 votes) - click stars to rate

div.p: The Flash finds himself in a war torn alternate timeline and teams up with alternate versions of his fellow heroes to return home and restore the timeline.
Director: Jay Oliva | Stars: Justin Chambers, C. Thomas Howell, Michael B. Jordan, Kevin McKidd
